you-can-change-this-field-when-save-the-: You can change this field when save the current changes.

page-not-found-content: Hey! look like the page doesn't exist.

full-url-of-your-site: Full URL of your site. Complete with the protocol HTTP or HTTPS (only if you have enabled SSL on your server).
with-the-locales-you-can-set-the-regiona: With the locales, you can set the regional user interface, such as the dates in your language. The locales need to be installed on your system.

this-is-a-brief-description-of-yourself-: 這这是关于您自己或是网站的简短介绍，如果想要修改，请至管理界面/设置/插件，设置一个名为“关于”的插件

example-page-1-content: Start writing your own content or edit the current to fit your needs. To create, edit or remove content you need to login to the admin panel with the username `admin` and the password you set on theinstallation process.
example-page-2-content: Update the settings of your site from the admin panel, you can change the title, description and the social networks from Settings > General.
example-page-3-content: Get information about news, new releases, new themes or new plugins on our social networks Facebook, Twitter and YouTube or visit our Blog.
example-page-4-content: Your About page is typically one of the most visited pages on your site, need to be simple with a few key things, such as your name, who are you, how can contact you, a small story, etc.
the-extension-zip-is-not-installed: The extension zip is not installed, to use this plugin you need to install the extension.
there-are-no-sticky-pages-at-this-moment: There are no sticky pages at this moment.
there-are-no-scheduled-pages-at-this-mom: There are no scheduled pages at this moment.
number-in-minutes-for-every-execution-of: Number in minutes for every execution of autosave.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pag: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
set-a-cover-image-from-external-url,-suc: Set a cover image from an external URL, such as a CDN or some server dedicated for images.
start-typing-a-page-title-to-see-a-list-: Start typing a page title to see a list of suggestions.
field-used-when-ordering-content-by-posi: Field used when ordering content by position
write-a-template-name-to-filter-the-page: Write a template name to filter the page in the theme and change the style of the page.
write-the-tags-separated-by-commas: Write the tags separated by comma.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-show-th: This tells search engines not to show this page in their search results.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-follow-: This tells search engines not to follow links on this page.
this-tells-search-engines-not-to-save-a-: This tells search engines not to save a cached copy of this page.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-cat: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
the-nickname-is-almost-used-in-the-theme: The nickname is almost used in the themes to display the author of the content
allow-unicode-characters-in-the-url-and-: Allow Unicode characters in the URL and some part of the system.
drag-and-drop-to-sort-the-plugins: Drag and Drop to sort the plugins.
leave-empty-for-autocomplete-by-bludit: Leave empty for autocomplete by Bludit.
choose-a-password-for-the-user-admin: Choose a password for the user admin
the-content-is-saved-as-a-draft-to-publi: The content is saved as a draft. To publish it click on the button Publish or if you still working on it click on Save as draft.
there-are-no-pages-at-this-moment: There are no pages at this moment.
there-are-no-static-pages-at-this-moment: There are no static pages at this moment.
there-are-no-draft-pages-at-this-moment: There are no draft pages at this moment.
there-are-no-images-for-the-page: There are no images for the page.
this-plugin-depends-on-the-following-plu: This plugin depends on the following plugins.
file-type-is-not-supported: File type is not supported. Allowed types:
author-can-write-and-edit-their-own-cont: Author: Can write and edit their own content. Editor: Can write and edit the content of others.
